Package tasks.coref.spl.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CataphoraDiscourseConnectives
    Utility to find sentence-initial discourse connectives in sentences that involve cataphora with pronominal mentions.
    SPLCoercionList
    A simple utility class to determine candidate words for semantic coercion from the dataset.
    SPLCountTypes
    Utility to count coreference type-mention type pairs in the gold standard.
    SPLHypernyms
    Utility class to count the number of times each coreferential mention head (potential hypernym) is used to corefer to different entity types.
